site_name: Land Between Park View And Cloister Road
description: Creation of a temporary marketing suite (Use Class E(c)) and associated external alterations
subdivision_of_building: Please Refer to attached plans and covering letter.
decision_conditions: The use hereby permitted shall be discontinued and the temporary building hereby approved shall be removed within 3 years of the date of this decision. Following removal of the temporary offices, the land shall return to its approved use as car parking.

Reason: In order that the local planning authority may assess the impact of the use at the end of the limited period hereby permitted, having regard to any complaints received and any other material considerations existing at the time, and to comply with section 8 of the National Planning Policy Framework(2021), policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policy 1.1 (g) of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy 2012 and the London Plan(2021) | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

H8630-TAT-SW-00-DR-AD-06-103 Revision P00 (Site Location Plan Marketing Suite); H860-TAT-A0-00-DR-AD-06-100 (Block A - GA Plan - LV 00); H8630-TAT-SW-00-DR-AD-06-104 Revision P00 (Marketing Suite Context Plan); H8630-TAT-A0-ZZ-DR-AD-06-120 (Block A - East & North Elevation); H8630-TAT-A0-ZZ-DR-AD-06-121 (Block A - West & South Elevation); 05039(01)-01-001L (GA Layout - Option A); 05039(03)-01-101 (External Elevations - NORTH); 05039(03)-01-102 (External Elevations - SOUTH); 05039(03)-01-101L (External Elevations - NORTH (MS Location)); 05039(03)-01-102L (External Elevations - SOUTH (MS Location)); Cover Letter (dated 08/04/2024)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development hereby approved shall be as per those described in the submitted application form and plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023). | Prior to use, details shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval in writing, of plant/ machinery/ equipment/ducting/air in- and outlets/ mechanical installations and their external rating noise level (LAr,Tr), together with mitigation measures as appropriate. The measures shall ensure that the emitted external rating noise level will be lower than the lowest existing background sound level LA90 by 10dBA at the most noise sensitive receiver locations at the development site and at surrounding premises. The assessment shall be made in accordance with BS4142:2014 +A1 2019, with all plant/equipment operating together at maximum capacity.  The assessment shall be carried out to confirm compliance with the noise criteria and shall include additional steps to mitigate noise as necessary.
Approved details shall be implemented prior to use of plant/ machinery/ equipment and thereafter be permanently retained.

Reason:   To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site is not adversely affected by noise in accordance with policies 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policies D6 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023). | Prior to use, machinery, plant and equipment/ extraction/ ventilation system and ducting at the development shall be mounted with proprietary anti-vibration isolators and fan motors shall be vibration isolated from the casing and adequately silenced and maintained as such.
Reason:  To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site/ surrounding premises is not adversely affected by noise from mechanical installations/ equipment.
